item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Codeless has been quietly but consistently building a powerhouse portfolio of web site design and marketing success.
We have cheerfully and expertly designed, developed, strategized and implemented web marketing programs and wordpress sites for small and large medical clients, non-profit foundations, design agencies, real estate groups and small service clients. item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text title="Understand Patients and HCPs"]

Understand Patients and HCPs

Since 2000, we have been helping pharmaceutical companies and health and wellness brands understand patients and HCPs by bringing unique qualitative research methodologies to global health and wellness market research. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text title="Up Close and Personal"]

Up Close and Personal

We are a leader in the field of market research with years of experience in qualitative and ethnographic research practices, and pride ourselves on finding new and interesting ways to share our findings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text title="U.S. and Global"]

U.S. and Global

We work internationally through affiliates in Europe, Asia and Australia, offering our clients a resource across demographics and throughout the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!
